title: RuntimeError: Unable to locate python command in /usr/lib/python-exec/bin

labels.name: bootstrap
labels.description: Issues occurring while spack builds its own dependencies.

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Spack tries to find python in '/usr/lib/python-exec/bin' . WTF is this dir, I do not have it in ubuntu or gentoo.

```console
$  spack --debug --stacktrace solve quantum-espresso ~scalapack
```
